name: The Power of the Slowgun
description:
With no crewmates left and a missing hand, you must travel and survive the depths of space with your broken-down ship and your Slowgun. Can you survive?

Numbers 1 - 0 change the strength of the Slowgun.

Movement - WASD

Space - Jump

Will Vincent - Level Design/Artist

Natori Patilla - Character Design/Artist

Noah Lemaire - Engineer/Project Manager
